__e: Sebastian just thought that... I shouldn't know about my dad?
Did you know that Sebastian never spoke a word until he was three years old?
- And how is that my fault? Why, I'm sure when he was supposed to be filing them, he was in some hotel, doing to you what Sebastian just did to me.
This is Li'l Sebastian, and this is a sign.
Now the only thing i could remember about me and Sebastian was how happy I was.. And now I wasn't.
His name is Sebastian, and he's not my man.
Sebastian, I'm sorry, look, it's over. We're going.
So when Sebastian surprised me, said he wanted to become an agent, I...
Sebastian gave me 20 books to read, but I'm not a reader like him.
With me and Sebastian, it's never the right time.
These are questions Li'I Sebastian never had to answer because he was a horse.
The truth was Sebastian and I weren't that far apart, except that now... we were.
